control_attributes.Control: AU-5 RESPONSE TO AUDIT PROCESSING FAILURES
control_attributes.control_description: The information system: a. Alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] in the event of an audit processing failure; andb. Takes the following additional actions: [Assignment: organization-defined actions to be taken (e.g., shut down information system, overwrite oldest audit records, stop generating audit records)].

Control Statement: The information system: a. Alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] in the event of an audit processing failure; andb. Takes the following additional actions: [Assignment: organization-defined actions to be taken (e.g., shut down information system, overwrite oldest audit records, stop generating audit records)].
Control Name: AU-5 RESPONSE TO AUDIT PROCESSING FAILURES
